basic.floral_language:
Pelargonium x domesticum 
Floriography: beautiful, content, and sunny.
Pelargonium x domesticum is a plant with high vitality.  Bloom color can be red, pink, purple or orange.  Flower petal simple or polyphyll.  Leaves green and kidney-shaped.  Garden uses include beds, borders and family decorating.
Pelargonium x domesticum grows well in places with plenty of sunlight in spring and autumn.  Note to shade appropriately in fall.  Flower time from May to July, bloom lasts for two to three weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period May-July, viewing period 2-3 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, in spring and autumn put in sunny places, in summer place in a cool ventilated place
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, half dormant in summer, reduce water and fertilization
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely
